homepage.carouselCourseTitle: Most people interested in this course

homepage.coreValueTitle: With many platforms available, what makes AgTeach the best choice?

coreValue.title: Learn to live sustainably and be self-sufficient
coreValue.message: Our platform helps you grow your own food, reduce grocery store trips, and cut down on your carbon footprint

coreValue.title: Your Health and Wellness is our priority
coreValue.message: Our courses teach you how to grow nutritious, pesticide-free food so you and your family can enjoy the freshest, healthiest meals.

coreValue.title: Gain Valuable Knowledge and Skills
coreValue.message: You'll learn techniques like hydroponics, vertical farming and crop rotation, along with practical tips you can apply immediately.

faqList.question: What exactly is AgTeach?
faqList.answer: Simple! We're your one-stop platform for learning farming through video courses and buying the supplies you need. Think of us as your farming teacher and supply store, all in one place.

faqList.question: Is this for complete beginners?
faqList.answer: Absolutely! Whether you've never planted a seed or you're an experienced farmer, we've got something for you. We start with the basics and build up to advanced techniques.

faqList.question: What kinds of farming videos do you have?
faqList.answer:
Everything from "How to Start Your First Garden" to advanced topics like:
- Growing different crops
- Taking care of your soil
- Dealing with pests naturally
- Setting up irrigation
- Harvesting tips
- And lots more!

faqList.question: What can I buy in your marketplace?
faqList.answer:
All the essentials you learn about in our videos:
- Seeds
- Tools
- Soil supplies
- Plant food
- Pest control
- Safety gear

homepage.ctaTitle: Ready to share your passion for indoor gardening?
homepage.ctaDescription: Join our platform as an instructor and inspire others while showcasing your expertise. Empower the next generation of gardeners and grow your impact today! Apply now and be a part of our vibrant community

termsService.generalInformation: Welcome to AgTeach! By accessing or using our website (https://alphabeez.anbschool.org/), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. AgTeach is an educational and e-commerce platform offering courses and products primarily focused on the agriculture sector. By using AgTeach, you confirm that you are at least 15 years old. Users under this age are not permitted to register or use our services.
termsService.userAccounts: To access certain features, users must create an account by providing accurate information, including username, date of birth, email, password, phone number, first name, last name, city, and address. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.
termsService.purchasesandPayments: AgTeach offers both tangible agricultural products and digital courses. Payments are securely processed through Stripe. Refunds are issued only for products that are out of stock or undelivered. No refunds are available for course purchases.
termsService.prohibitedActivities: Users must refrain from spamming, posting illegal or inappropriate content, or engaging in activities that violate Cambodian law. Violations may result in account suspension, termination, or legal action.
termsService.intellectualProperty: All website content, including text, graphics, and logos, is owned by AgTeach. Users may not reproduce or distribute this content without written consent.
termsService.privacyPolicy: AgTeach collects only the information provided during signup and does not share user data with third parties. For details, refer to our Privacy Policy.
termsService.disclaimerofLiability: AgTeach is not responsible for technical issues, system downtime, or losses resulting from unauthorized access. Users acknowledge that they use the website at their own risk.
termsService.disputeResolution: These Terms are governed by Cambodian law. Disputes will first be addressed through direct negotiation. If unresolved, disputes will be handled through arbitration or Cambodian courts.
termsService.modificationstoTerms: AgTeach reserves the right to update these Terms and Conditions at any time. Updates will be posted on the website. Continued use constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
termsService.terminationofAccess: AgTeach may terminate or suspend user accounts for violating these Terms or engaging in prohibited activities.
termsService.ContactUs: For questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at khomkhit460@gmail.com
